PageTitle: pcp version1 ignore prefer-failure (DS-Lite instance view)
FuncDef:
The pcp version1 ignore prefer-failure command enables a device to send PCPv1 response packets without the prefer_failure option.
The undo pcp version1 ignore prefer-failure command restores the default configuration.
By default, a device sends PCPv1 response packets carrying the prefer_failure option.
ExtraInfo: If a non-Huawei CPE device cannot identify PCPv1 response packets carrying the prefer_failure option sent by a Huawei CGN device, the CPE fails to connect to the CGN device. To prevent the connection failure, run the pcp version1 ignore prefer-failure command to enable the CGN device to send PCPv1 response packets without the prefer_failure option.
